description: Located in the heart of the lower east side, you're surrounded by many great restaurants, nightlife and entertainment venues. Our studio is less than 2 minute walk to th(URL HIDDEN)trains and only 8 minute walk to the B D express station. You can get anywhere you want in the city while saving a lot of time on commute. There are also citibike stations, which are conveniently located around almost every corner. Supermarket and Laundry is right around the corner.
name: Comfy private home in LES
review: Just what we were looking for. Great location; very lively with awesome bars and restaurants in walking distance. Apartment was very basic but clean and functional. There is quite a walk-up so keep this in mind before you bring tons of baggage. Host was kind enough to accommodate our change of check-in time at the last minute.
